amendment.description: Amendment sought to strike the subsection preventing DOE from issuing a new loan guarantee for applications submitted after December 31, 2011.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 2 printed in House Report 112-668 to strike the subsection preventing DOE from issuing a new loan guarantee for applications submitted after December 31, 2011.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A002) Failed by recorded vote: 170 - 231 (Roll no. 582).
